GSD.description:
dmaengine: sprd: Cleanup in .remove() after pm_runtime_get_sync() failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 613d8b44e91b83be2cfca6f69f587634795903c4. For more details please see the references link.
